mapper.select: SELECT feed.feed_cnt, follower.follower_cnt, following.following_cnt, is_follow.is_follow FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) as feed_cnt FROM feed WHERE uno = #{other_uno}) as feed , (SELECT COUNT(*) as follower_cnt FROM user_follow WHERE following = #{other_uno}) as follower, (SELECT COUNT(*) as following_cnt FROM user_follow WHERE follower = #{other_uno}) as following, (SELECT COUNT(*) as is_follow FROM user_follow WHERE follower = #{my_uno} and following = #{other_uno}) as is_follow
